page.title: 13Entertainment.Hoo area.
page.content: There is very little entertainment provided here. If one wants the more sophisticated pastimes such as swimmimg,disco,dancing or cinema,one has to travel to Ipswich- 20 kms away,or Woodbridge 12kms,with a very limited public transport service. Many people congregate in local public houses or hotels,particularly young people who find them excellent meeting places. Entertainments such as discos,barn dances and coffee mornings are held from time to time in village halls.A flower show is held annually at Kettl- eburgh.Church fetes & garden parties raise funds for the churches or their chosen charities. Womens' Institute meetings are held monthly at Brandeston or Kettleburgh. Cycling is popular for transport & fun.
